relationships.name: Chen Xiaodao
relationships.type: Doctor-patient relationship (once performed an emergency surgery on Chen Xiaodao)

relationships.name: Lin Xiu
relationships.type: Professional aversion (Su Mingyue dislikes gambling addicts)

events.details: Chen directly asks about the technology and its connection to the ship's disappearance, causing Lin Xiu to reach for a concealed weapon
consequences: Lin Xiu reveals he has access to restricted systems
Su Mingyue confirms the equipment is for temporal manipulation

events.details: Experimental equipment activates unexpectedly, showing glimpses of past/future ship conditions before overloading
consequences: Reveals the ship exists in multiple time periods simultaneously

events.details: Su Mingyue proposes using the temporal equipment to stabilize the ship long enough to escape, requiring cooperation with Lin Xiu
consequences: Truce temporarily formed with Lin Xiu
